sentences.sContent: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.sCn: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

synos.tran: 奔流；倾注；迸发；连续不断

remMethod.val: tor(=torn转动) + rent → 水流转动不停地前进 → 洪流， 急流； 迸发

trans.tranCn: 洪流， 急流； 爆发， 迸发
trans.tranOther: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction
